name: Inari Hills
description:
Inari Hills is a android mobile 2D Minigame Bundle with, 2 implemented minigames:

The game was made in unity and is intended for the ages of 7 and up and consists of a Small village were all neighbours took each others job for granted and from that they swapped jobs and madness occured. Those jobs are going to be played in the form of Action Arcade minigames where the player has to do the best he can for the village.

Insect Chase -  Consists in a vertical scroller where u have to dodge obstacles and catch butterflies while also being able to get power-ups and extra lifes by Hold and Drag actions.. Color Garden - A pool like minigame where you have to put all the vegetables to their according boxes by creating a ball and throwing it to your desired direction by Hold, Drag and Release actions.
